title: Last hofer needed - McGraw with cap
author: CrazyDiamond

posts.post_title: Last hofer needed - McGraw with cap
posts.post_content:
One more needed to complete the hofers (minus wagner and plank)

Looking for McGraw with cap

Graded preferred sgc or psa  1-2 . Will consider raw in similar condition. 

PM me if you have anything for sale 

Thanks
Greg
I just finished my HOFer run, with 3 or better last week. Took about 3 1/2 years. That is quite an accomplishment congrats. I don't have an extra with cap but I will keep my eyes open for you.

[quote name="bmwntux" post=2150468]I just finished my HOFer run, with 3 or better last week. Took about 3 1/2 years. That is quite an accomplishment congrats. I don't have an extra with cap but I will keep my eyes open for you.[/QUOTE]


Thank you. Appreciate that. 

Congrats to you as well.
Well sure enough Heritage has an SGC 4 in their current auction. More than you're looking for but maybe you want to splurge for your last card?

[quote name="bmwntux" post=2150712]Well sure enough Heritage has an SGC 4 in their current auction. More than you're looking for but maybe you want to splurge for your last card?[/QUOTE]


Thanks for the heads up.  Yeah that’s a little more than I’m looking for.

Appreciate it though

Bump…still looking. Please PM if you have anything for sale 

Thanks

I have a PSA Authentic (not altered) Old Mill with back damage being the reason for the Authentic.

PM if interested
